A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Let me get this straight.  If you don't like this movie you are either a bot\, troll\, sexist\, racist or alt-right.  Ok.

How about this movie stunk and left true fans upset?  No?  Couldn't be that\, right?  

Minor spoiler alert 
I cannot understand how this script didn't end up in the toilet where it belonged.  Luke would have never acted that way!  No mention of who Snoke was.  Rey needs to be trained properly\, not for 1 day.  The Rose character should never have seen the light of day.  Who is the new villain?  Kylo Ren?  Really?

How could anyone reviewing this script have thought that all of the heavy handed socialist\, feminist agenda was ok?

Sigh.  Lifelong fan here going to lick my wounds.  Really cannot imagine caring at this point what happens.  I really never thought I'd say this but I'm done with the Star Wars Universe\, at least as long as it's in Rian Johnson and Disney's hands.
